column2: Clinical Training: Participate in hands-on clinical training, assisting with patient care activities under the supervision of registered nurses or other healthcare professionals      Patient Care: Assist in providing basic patient care, including bathing, feeding, dressing, and mobility assistance      Learn to monitor and report changes in patients' conditions to the supervising nurse      Medication Assistance: Learn proper procedures for medication administration, including dosage calculation, medication routes, and documentation      Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date patient records, including vital signs, treatment details, and other relevant information      Observation: Observe patient behavior and responses to treatment and report any concerns to the nursing team

Job Description        Consistently offer professional,  friendly and engaging service    Lead and manage the day-to-day operation of the department and ensure service standards are followed    Address guest concerns and react quickly,  logging and notifying proper departments as required    To liaise with the Valet Supervisor in order to ensure an efficient Uniform Program that includes proper inventories,  ordering and distribution of uniforms,  as well as preventive maintenance program for proper upkeep of all uniforms.      To take full responsibility for managing linen inventories and linen quality controls,  inclusive of conducting accurate quarterly linen inventories; and to ensure accurate linen distribution to guest floors and Food & Beverage outlets.      To keep records of linen productions and losses,  and to maintain proper linen discard programs,  including rag control and distribution.     Conduct regularly scheduled departmental meetings    Manage the departmental budget in a fiscally responsible manner    Oversee the recruitment and training of all Laundry Colleagues    Balance operational,  administrative and Colleague needs    Follow departmental policies and procedures    Report necessary maintenance items    Follow all safety and sanitation policies    Other duties as assigned        Qualifications        Previous leadership experience required    Computer literate in Microsoft Window applications preferred    University/College degree in a related discipline an asset    Excellent communication and organizational skills    Strong interpersonal and problem solving abilities    Highly responsible & reliable    Ability to work cohesively as part of a team    Ability to focus attention on guest needs,  remaining calm and courteous at all times    Minimum of five years laundry experience    Knowledge of occupational hazards and of necessary safety precautions        Additional Information          Our commitment to Diversity & Inclusion  :      We are an inclusive company,  and our ambition is to attract,  recruit and promote diverse talent.
